member.name: NMRBAUTOSIZE
member.summary: Contains information used in handling the RBN_AUTOSIZE notification codes.

member.name: NMRBAUTOSIZE.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains additional information about the notification.

member.name: NMRBAUTOSIZE.fChanged
member.summary: Member that indicates if the size or layout of the rebar control has changed (nonzero if a change occurred or zero otherwise).

member.name: NMRBAUTOSIZE.rcTarget
member.summary: structure that contains the rectangle to which the rebar control tried to size itself.

member.name: NMRBAUTOSIZE.rcActual
member.summary: structure that contains the rectangle to which the rebar control actually sized itself.
